channel.title: Package on Recology
channel.description: Recent content in Package on Recology

item.title: atomize - make new packages from other packages
item.description: We (rOpenSci) just held our 3rd annual rOpenSci unconference (https://unconf16.ropensci.org/) in San Francisco. There were a lot of ideas, and lots of awesome projects from awesome people came out of the 2 day event. One weird idea I had comes from looking at the Node world, where there are lots of tiny packages, instead of the often larger packages we have in the R world. One reason for tiny in Node is that of course you want a library to be tiny if running in the browser for faster load times (esp.
